page.title: 19Henry Prince First School.2
page.content: The School Today. The school has 75 children.Their ages are from 4 to 9 years.There are three classes and 3.5 teachers,including the Headmaster.The biggest room is used for Assemblies,singing,watching television and eating dinners.We start school at 9 a.m. and finish at 3.15p.m.We have an extension which was built 7 years go.There is a playground and a field.The are two gas-fired boilers for the central heating.Dinners are cooked in the kitchen.As well as the teachers there is a caretaker and cleaner,a secretary,two dinner supervisors,an ancillary assistant and three ladies in the kitchen.A crossing warden sees the children safely across the road.
